lead_paragraph: Flora breaks up with Joe due to his lack of ambition. Wanting Flora back in his life, Joe discovers the website "Break Up Club" which promises to reunite lost loves if they are willing to break up another loving couple. Meanwhile, Joe is chosen to participate in a documentary about break-ups to prove that the "Break Up Club" is real.
